Files Headings

baseFind.js

The base implementation of _.find, _.findLast, _.findKey, and _.findLastKey, without support for callback shorthands and this binding, which iterates over collection using the provided eachFunc.

Params
collection Array Object string The collection to search.
predicate Function The function invoked per iteration.
eachFunc Function The function to iterate over collection.
[retKey] boolean Specify returning the key of the found element instead of the element itself. 
function baseFind(collection, predicate, eachFunc, retKey) {
  var result;
  eachFunc(collection, function(value, key, collection) {
    if (predicate(value, key, collection)) {
      result = retKey ? key : value;
      return false;
    }
  });
  return result;
}

module.exports = baseFind;
